{rag_pack}

{count_info}Summarize into evidence bullets for MDT decision-making.

- Each bullet must be actionable evidence (guideline/trial-based).
- Do NOT restate patient-specific facts.
- Avoid long quotes.
- Each bullet MUST include at least one evidence tag: [@guideline:doc_id|page] or [@pubmed:PMID].
- Output ONLY plain text bullets, one per RAG result, in order.
